effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 507,403 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 245,144.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.
